DataElement.preferredName: Neurologic Cognitive Assessment Word Relationship Second Column Complete Total Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the total numeric count as related to neurocognitive evaluation by the second column in the Controlled Oral Word Association (COWA) being done.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Neurologic Cognitive Assessment Word Relationship Second Column Complete
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to neurocognitive evaluation by the second column in the Controlled Oral Word Association (COWA) being done.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (noor-uh-LOJ-ik) Having to do with nerves or the nervous system.:Cognitive; of or being or relating to or involving cognition.:Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to nerves or the nervous system.
Of or being or relating to or involving cognition.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Property.preferredDefinition: A word or expression used for some particular thing.:Related; connected or associated.:Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude.:An arrangement of objects one under another in a line.:Complete; having every necessary or normal part or component or step; or having come or been brought to a conclusion.

Concepts.definition: A word or expression used for some particular thing.
A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.
Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude.
An arrangement of objects one under another in a line.
To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: RTOG CRF:Radiation Therapy Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the total numeric count of something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete.:To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
Determining the number or amount of something.

DataElement.origin: RTOG CRF:Radiation Therapy Oncology Group Case Report Form
